operating_system_key1: Do log ko mil kar sabse pehle yeh videos dekhni hai
operating_system_key2: Ab aapko 30 mins ke liye aapas mei `english` mei inn topics ke baarein mei baat karni hai.
operating_system_key3: Baat karte karte, aap observe karein, ki aap kitne tech words use kar paa rahe hai.
operating_system_key4: Aur agar aapka partner koi aisa tech word bolta hai, jo aapko nahi pata, ya aap generally use nahi kartein. Inn words ko bhi samajhne ki phir koshish karein.
operating_system_key5: Iss discussion ko karte hue, aap inn points ke baarein mei bhi soch sakte hai:
operating_system_key7: Agar hum ek computer hote toh hamara `Operating System` kya hota?
operating_system_key10: NavGurukul ke `OS` mei `Hardware` kya hoga, aur `Software` kya hoga?
operating_system_key11: Kya `OS` ko bhi kisi `programmer` ne likha hoga?
operating_system_key13: Jab hum bolte hai - `laptop` hang kar gaya hai, toh iska kya matlab hota hai?
operating_system_key14: Kya ek simple phone, jo `smartphone` nahi hai, kya usmei bhi `OS` hota hai?
operating_system_key15: Kya aap ko lagta hai, ki ek samay hoga jab `OS` itne advanced na ho, jitne aaj ho.
operating_system_key16: Sochiye pehla windows `OS` kaisa dikhta hoga?
operating_system_key17: Agar aap ko aur thoda samajhna hai, toh yeh dekhiye
operating_system_key18:
**Tips**:
1 - Aap subtitles/captions on kar sakte hai, `YouTube` Video dekhte hue
2 - Aap speed kam ya jyada kar sakte hai, video ke liye, jisse ki aap acche se dekh payein
